article.title: Automation Stops Here: A Case for Man-Made Book Collections
article.author: Rouse, Roscoe
article.text: The following paper was read at the Second International Seminar on Approval and Gathering Plans for Large and Medium-Size Academic Libraries, Kalamazoo, Michigan, October 31, 1969.. We print it here because its dissenting viewpoint is a timely as it is provocative..
